among women with a family history of diabetes.   Although gestational diabetes usually goes away after the baby is born, a woman who has had gestational diabetes is more likely to develop type 2 diabetes later in life. Babies born to mothers who had gestational diabetes are also more likely to develop obesity and type 2 diabetes as they grow up.",NIDDK,Am I at Risk for Type 2 Diabetes? Taking Steps to Lower Your Risk of Getting Diabetes
